question: Who breakes the 300m World Record at Golden Spike Meet recently?
explanation: Jaco Van Niekerk of South Africa Breaks 300m World Record at Golden Spike Meet. He broke Michael Johnson's previous world record in the 300m of 30.85. He was already the first ever sprinter to run sub-10 in the 100m,sub-20 in the 200m, and sub-44 in the 400m race.
